EnhancedContent:
Explore practical AI use cases available through Microsoft Marketplace—from prebuilt AI apps and agents to AI‑powered solutions that simplify buying and deployment.

As organizations look to move from AI experimentation to real business impact, Microsoft Marketplace plays a critical role in helping customers discover, evaluate, and deploy AI apps and agents that integrate seamlessly with their Microsoft investments. In this office hours session, you will learn how Marketplace supports common business scenarios and the best practices that you can use to accelerate AI adoption while maximizing their overall cloud performance.

Note: Office hours for customers are typically held the last Wednesday of every month, 8:30 AM Pacific Time unless otherwise noted.

## How do I participate?

Registration is not required. Add this event to your calendar, then sign in to the Tech Community and select Attend to receive reminders. Post your questions in advance, or any time during the live broadcast.

[Pearl-Angeles](/users/pearl-angeles/2717419) Updated Feb 11, 2026

Description:
Explore practical AI use cases available through Microsoft Marketplace—from prebuilt AI apps and agents to AI‑powered solutions that simplify buying and deployment.

As organizations look to move from AI experimentation to real business impact, Microsoft Marketplace plays a critical role in helping customers discover, evaluate, and deploy AI apps and agents that integrate seamlessly with their Microsoft investments. In this office hours session, you will learn how Marketplace supports common business scenarios and the best practices that you can use to accelerate AI adoption while maximizing their overall cloud performance.

Note: Office hours for customers are typically held the last Wednesday of every month, 8:30 AM Pacific Time unless otherwise noted.

## How do I participate?

Registration is not required. Add this event to your calendar, then sign in to the Tech Community and select Attend to receive reminders. Post your questions in advance, or any time during the live broadcast.
Author: Pearl-Angeles
Title: Accelerating AI adoption through Microsoft Marketplace
